Go to the future to see how technology has evolved and how society has changed.
Visit different countries and cultures around the world to learn about their customs, traditions, and way of life.
Go back in time to important moments in your own life to change a decision or fix a mistake.
Visit different eras in history to witness important events such as wars, revolutions, or scientific discoveries.
